description: Find 20 pounds of salt.

dialogue.describe: I need a supply of salt.
dialogue.offer: I know this doesn't sound important, but I am running low on salt.  We don't just need it as a seasoning, it's also vital for food preservation.  Could you find about 20 pounds of salt for me?
dialogue.accepted: Don't forget to tell me when you have them.
dialogue.rejected: It's okay, I can do without them.  Just let me know if you reconsider.
dialogue.advice: There's a lot of places to look.  They are common in house kitchens, restaurants or grocery stores.
dialogue.inquire: How is the search going?  Have you found 'em?
dialogue.success: I really appreciate your help.  Don't worry, you won't leave empty-handed.
dialogue.failure: Don't worry about it, it's not that important.

description: Find 5 glass jars.

dialogue.offer: This task is bit more serious.  I don't have enough jars to preserve perishables for the future, and we can't just store everything in salt.  We could do our own canning if we had some more glass jars.  I could get by with 5 for now.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks for accepting this task.  It'll take a load off my shoulders.  I finally won't have to worry about this problem anymore.
dialogue.rejected: Just let me know if you change your mind.
dialogue.advice: Glass jars are not that hard to find.  I'd look for them in residential areas.
dialogue.success: Thank you for your help.  Here's your reward.  I have one more task to do.
dialogue.failure: It's not a big deal, it isn't that urgent.

description: Find a butcher knife.

dialogue.offer: I don't have any butcher knives in here.  It's difficult to cut anything hard without it.  It's good to have one, even though I won't use it that often.  Could you get me one?
dialogue.accepted: Thank you for accepting.  I can't cut anything with this dull knife.
dialogue.rejected: I guess I have to cut them with my steak knife.
dialogue.advice: Butcher knives are not that rare to find.  They are commonly found in kitchens.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have that knife now?
dialogue.success: I am grateful for the help you've done.
dialogue.failure: Don't worry about it, it's not that important.

description: Find 3 mystery novels.

dialogue.describe: I'd like to read some mystery novels.
dialogue.offer: Hmm, that would be great!  But if you do, please bring more than just one.  I could read a single novel in a day.  Could you get me… 3 mystery novels?
dialogue.accepted: Just bring it to me when you have it.
dialogue.rejected: Nevermind then.  I hope you'll change your mind.
dialogue.advice: I'd loot libraries and bookstores.
dialogue.inquire: So, have you found the books?
dialogue.success: Thank you.  This will keep me busy for a while.  Please take this as a token of my gratitude.
dialogue.success_lie: Could you give them to me?
dialogue.failure: Fine.  I can read something else.

description: Find a wire to be used as a guitar string.

dialogue.describe: I need a new guitar string.
dialogue.offer: One of my guitar strings busted from where I smacked a zombie.  If you could get me a wire, I can rig it to work as a substitute.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks.  I'll give you a performance when you get back with it.
dialogue.rejected: I guess I'll just skip that note.
dialogue.advice: Any old wire should do.
dialogue.success: Thank you so much!  This should last for a while.
dialogue.failure: Don't worry about it, I'll do it myself.

description: Find eight pipes for Darryl Johnson.

dialogue.describe: I need eight pipes to start construction.
dialogue.offer: Now that's some enthusiasm, pal.  Ever since our water supply shut off, we've been using the nearby river for most of our water needs.  Who knows how many bloated corpses have decayed in that.  I want to construct a well, but I'm missing some building materials - eight pipes to be exact.
dialogue.accepted: I wish you the best, pal.  I appreciate it.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.
dialogue.advice: Try disassembling some lockers.  Just don't destroy our furniture, we'll be needing it.
dialogue.success: Great, I can finally start constructing this thing.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: I guess it was just a pipe dream.

description: Find a mechanical pump for Darryl Johnson.

dialogue.describe: I need a mechanical pump to finish construction.
dialogue.offer: It's less like a well, and more like a covered pit currently.  I'll need you to find a mechanical pump, one that will make this <swear> thing work.
dialogue.accepted: Take care of yourself out there.
dialogue.rejected: Come back when you get a chance.  We need skilled survivors.
dialogue.advice: Try disassembling another well.
dialogue.success: Much obliged, survivor.  Thanks to you, we don't need to worry about where our water's gonna come from.  Here, take this as a token of our gratitude.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

description: Get 150 nails for Darryl.

dialogue.describe: I need nails to build a chicken coop
dialogue.offer: Now that we've got a steady supply of water, I've been thinking about raising some livestock.  I'm starting with some chickens I found on a farm the other day, but I don't have a coop for them.  If you can get me 150 nails, I can start building one.
dialogue.accepted: Take care of yourself out there.
dialogue.rejected: Its a simple job.
dialogue.advice: You could take apart some furniture in town, or make them yourself.
dialogue.success: Thank you.  I should have some eggs in a week, once I finish the coop.  Come back and buy some!
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

description: Help Russell Connelly expand his trophy collection by gathering three hunks of slime glob.

dialogue.offer: I have the location for an alien crash site.  I want you to investigate and bring me anything you'd find interesting.
dialogue.accepted: Good luck out there!
dialogue.rejected: That's all right.  Not everyone is cut out for this.
dialogue.advice: Worst case scenario you'll be covered in slime.  There's nothing to fear, I hope.
dialogue.success: Good one!  Survivor, you have just passed my test.  I knew you could do it.  Your work shall be rewarded!
dialogue.failure: You give up?  This country fell apart because no one could find a good man to rely on… might as well give up, I guess.

description: Continue the quest for trophies by finding an unhatched spider egg.

dialogue.offer: <the_cataclysm> didn't spare us humans.  Our former selves would look at us in disgust at the things we do for survival.  At least, that's what I was told.  I heard reports of arachnids deep in the woods.  I can't exactly pinpoint where their webs are, but I'm sure you'll figure it out once you're stuck in them.  I'd like me a spider egg!
dialogue.accepted: Thanks, make sure you're ready for whatever beast is waiting for you.
dialogue.rejected: That's all right.  Not everyone is cut out for this.
dialogue.advice: Don't worry <name_g>, I wouldn't send you on a suicide mission, would I?
dialogue.success: Nice catch!  Friend, you've proven yourself to be an extraordinary survivor.  Maybe there's still hope for humanity.  I'll take that egg, thank you very much.  Here's your reward and some bullets for your effort.
dialogue.failure: You give up?  This country fell apart because no one could find a good man to rely on… might as well give up, I guess.

description: Bring one last trophy to Russell Connelly.  Harvest a sting from a bee.

dialogue.offer: It feels like I'm doing this for revenge.  I have one last mission for you.  Ever seen those ginormous bee hives?  Well, I can tell you where the closest one is.  Just kill off one stray bee, harvest its stinger and bring it to me.
dialogue.accepted: I wish you the best of luck, may God guide your path.
dialogue.rejected: This passion of mine may just be getting to me…
dialogue.advice: If I were you, I'd bring a gun and a butcher knife.  I don't think bug spray work anymore.
dialogue.inquire: How is the hunt going, survivor?  Any luck?
dialogue.success: Well, partner, this might just be the end of the road.  I hope you enjoyed it as much as I have.  In the meantime… here's your reward, a handful of icons, that's all I have left.  Spend them all, I think you've deserved it.
dialogue.failure: You give up now?  This country fell apart because no one could find a good man to rely on… might as well give up, I guess.

description: Kill whatever's keeping Zachary up at night.
//: Quest handled via external dialogue, player will never see this text.

dialogue.describe: Kill whatever's keeping Zachary up at night.
dialogue.success: Oh thank you!  Now I can finally get a nights sleep.  Here, I've got some icons saved up, I want you to have them.
dialogue.success_lie: I can still hear it, crying out in the night.
dialogue.failure: I'm not gonna go and fix this <swear> mess.

description: Purge the cultists in exchange for <reward_count:icon> icons.

dialogue.offer: There's a weird fungus that started to invade ever since <the_cataclysm>, and several individuals in strange robes are cultivating it.  I've seen what it can do, so I need you to execute them and destroy all traces of these strange mushrooms.
dialogue.accepted: God bless you!
dialogue.rejected: That fungus is going to kill us all if it isn't stopped.
dialogue.advice: Despite how fast it grows, it's highly vulnerable to fire.
dialogue.success: Thank you.  I don't like killing people, but this time we had too.  Here, take this; its some of our internal money that we've started using.  You know those religious pamphlets shaped like bills people would leave?  These are some of those, couldn't stand 'em myself.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: We'll have to try again, I suppose.

description: Retrieve a religious relic for Greenwood in exchange for <reward_count:icon> icons.

dialogue.offer: I've been looking to spruce up this place with some iconography, and a small relic would do just that.  It'd help tremendously with morale around here, so I need you to find one for me.
dialogue.accepted: Please bring it back as soon as possible.
dialogue.rejected: It'd really help us…
dialogue.advice: I know most cathedrals keep small relics, that's a good place to look.
dialogue.success: Thank you, <name_g>.  Take these for your trouble.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: I'll have to make my own, I guess…

description: Find twenty King James Bibles for Greenwood in exchange for <reward_count:icon> icons.

dialogue.offer: When we skipped town during <the_cataclysm>, most of us left our possessions behind.  We only have a few Bibles here for all of us, and they're starting to fall apart.  If you could get 20 more, in the King James version, I'd pay well for them.
dialogue.accepted: May God bless you.
dialogue.rejected: It'd really help us…
dialogue.advice: A book store should have enough, I'll mark one for you.
dialogue.success: May God bless you, <name_g>.
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: I'll have to make my own, I guess…

//: 5.50 (price of bibles) x 20 (count), with a 10% upcharge as a delivery fee. Divide by 2.50 to convert to icons.

description: Find ten rolls of toilet paper for Julian Ray.

dialogue.describe: I have a job for you…
dialogue.offer: As a matter of fact, yes you can.  You see, we're running low on toilet paper.  It's not something we can't live without, but it's luxury we can afford.  I can pay you handsomely if you find us ten rolls toilet paper.
dialogue.accepted: Well, that's great.  Good luck.
dialogue.rejected: Changed your mind already?
dialogue.advice: You remember what toilet paper is, right?
dialogue.inquire: How's the search going?  Any luck?
dialogue.success: Thank you.  Maybe you people aren't so bad after all.
dialogue.success_lie: Could you give it to me then?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways…

description: Get two wedding rings for Julian.

dialogue.offer: Olwen and I have been dating for a while now, and I was planning on asking her to marry me.  I never got the chance to buy our rings before <the_cataclysm>, but I think I'll surprise her with some in a few days.  If you could get me two of them, I'll pay a fair price: $250 in icons.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks <name_g>, I'm counting on you.
dialogue.rejected: I'd mean so much to the both of us, and there's a lot of money involved.
dialogue.advice: A jewelry store should have a pair.  If not, I'd check a wedding venue.
dialogue.success: Here's the money, as per our terms.  I really do appreciate this.
dialogue.failure: I'll have to look for them myself…

description: Get Gemmas fertility supplements.

dialogue.offer: To be honest, I'm not alright.  Have you met Darryl?  He's my husband, and we had a go at getting a baby recently.  The thing is, its not happening.  Now that we're in a safe spot, on our feet again, I want to try.  I'm trying to find some fertility supplements.  I ordered some before <the_cataclysm>, but I never got to pick them up.  If you'd go over and get them for me, I'd pay you.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.
dialogue.rejected: This means so much to me.
dialogue.advice: They should be near the counter, or on a shelf.
dialogue.success: Oh thank you!  Darryl will be so happy to hear about this!  Take there for your payment, it must've been hard for you.
dialogue.failure: How unfortunate…

description: Find ten cactus seeds for Gemma.

dialogue.offer: I'm wanting to try growing some new plants.  I've never tried growing cactus; if you could find some seeds for me, I'd pay you.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.
dialogue.rejected: I suppose more local fauna could work.
dialogue.advice: I'd try a gardening store or a home supply store would have some.
dialogue.inquire: Have you found any cactus seeds?
dialogue.success: I appreciate that, here's your money.  Parts of the cactus, such as the fruit, are edible.  I'll have to ask Simon if he can experiment with some of them.
dialogue.failure: How unfortunate…

description: Get 75 anti-psychotics for Jane.

dialogue.offer: I'm running out of antipsychotics, and Arturo is starting to see things again.  I'd pay for seventy-five antipsychotic pills, and be eternally grateful.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.  Arturo will be happy to get these.
dialogue.rejected: Would you please reconsider?  Arturo's had some bad hallucinations before, he'll go crazy without them.
dialogue.advice: The storage room of a pharmacy should have them.
dialogue.success: God bless you, <name_g>.  Arturo shouldn't have to worry about his hallucinations for a long time.
dialogue.failure: How unfortunate…

description: Find a solar panel for Corrie.

dialogue.offer: Okay, great.  We're gonna create a charger and a generator all in one.  Here's the battle plan.  Zack could create the framework, you'll get me a solar panel, the rest I can craft or repurpose from the bus.  Helena's promised us a reward if this thing lives up to her standards.
dialogue.accepted: With my brains and your brawn we'll make an excellent team.  A regular solar panel will do just fine.
dialogue.rejected: No electricity for us then.
dialogue.advice: All you need is a good wrench and a solar car.
dialogue.inquire: Do you have the solar panel?
dialogue.success: The great work is now complete.  Are you good with words, by the way?  I was thinking, maybe you should be the one to negotiate with Helena.  But whatever you do, don't accept their icons.  Our work is worth a lot more than their valueless currency.
dialogue.failure: No electricity for us then.

description: Get 800 sheets of paper for Felicity Powell.

dialogue.offer: Since <the_cataclysm> happened, I've had a surprising amount of free time.  I want to start writing, but there's very little paper around here.  For the time being, eight hundred sheets should do; I'll pay if you can get it for me.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks, you'll be the first to see my writing.
dialogue.rejected: I can understand that.  The offer's still available if you reconsider.
dialogue.advice: A bookstore or office supply should have tons of it.
dialogue.success: I appreciate it.  I'll get to work on my manuscript.
dialogue.failure: How unfortunate…

description: Get 30 pencils for Felicity Powell.

dialogue.offer: I've been writing for a bit, and I've used up my pencils.  If you could get me thirty more, I'll give you some money.
dialogue.accepted: I do appreciate it.
dialogue.rejected: I can understand that.  The offer's available if you reconsider.
dialogue.advice: An office building should have tons.
dialogue.success: Thank you so much!  I'll get back to work on my manuscript, I should have it ready in a month or so.
dialogue.failure: How unfortunate…

description: Find seven oxycodone pills for Theresa.

dialogue.offer: I've got an idea to solve my problem.  I'll pay you if you can find seven oxycodone pills for me; the ones they used to prescribe after a surgery.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you, <granny_name_g>.  I'm glad the youngsters still help the elderly.
dialogue.rejected: I can understand your hesitation <granny_name_g>.  I wouldn't worry about it too much.
dialogue.advice: An old doctors office should have some.  They have those fancy autodocs upstairs.
dialogue.success: I want you to have these few things of mine, I won't be needing them anymore.  I think I'll take a walk in the woods, get some fresh air for these old bones…
dialogue.failure: How unfortunate…

description: Get a candle for Jeremiah.

dialogue.offer: Have you met Chloe?  She's the girl with the butcher knife, came here with Sonia.  This may sound silly, but I want to ask her out on a date, have a picnic some time.  The only thing I need to get this plan to come together is a candle.  If you happen to find one, I'll pay you for it.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks, <name_g>.
dialogue.rejected: Please?  The dating scene isn't that big around here.
dialogue.advice: Someone's house might have one.
dialogue.success: I appreciate it.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Find three cans of tuna for Katherine.

dialogue.offer: I've had a craving for fish recently.  Could you find three cans of tuna for me?  I'll pay you for them.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.
dialogue.rejected: Alright.  I'll do it myself.
dialogue.advice: A house or grocery store should have some.
dialogue.success: Thank you, here's your payment.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Get a chemistry set for Kostas.

dialogue.offer: I've decided to start making more concentrated remedies for more serious cases, but I don't have a way of refining any herbs to that degree.  I'd pay for a chemistry set.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks, <name_g>.
dialogue.rejected: We could all use the medicine, including you.
dialogue.advice: A laboratory or pharmaceutical factory should have one.
dialogue.inquire: Have you found the chemistry set?
dialogue.success: Blessings be unto you.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Get 814 pounds of gravel (5,600 pebbles) for Kostas.

dialogue.offer: Demand for my herbal medicine has gone up recently, and I'm struggling to get all of my ingredients sustainably.  I'm going to build some planters on the rooftop, but I lack the material to do so in full.  I'd compensate you fairly for 814 pounds of gravel.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks, <name_g>.
dialogue.rejected: I understand that it seems formidable, but there is a good deal of money for you.
dialogue.advice: An outdoor emporium should have some.  Of course, you could always dig them up from a lakeshore or driveway.
dialogue.success: Blessings be unto you.  I'll start on the garden right away.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Find a marloss berry for Kostas.

dialogue.offer: I'm wanting to experiment with some of the more…  otherworldly fauna that have appeared recently.  I saw these pink berries inside a fungal infestation the other day before I burned it with a Molotov.  If you could get me one, I can pay you with a discount on my medicine.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks, <name_g>.
dialogue.rejected: I understand that it seems formidable, but there is a good deal of money for you.
dialogue.advice: I'd wear a hazmat suit while I'm in there.  Those spores are absolutely nasty for your health, if my observations of <zombies> nearby are any indication.
dialogue.success: I'll have to be careful with this thing, thanks for getting it for me.  Let's see what this can do…
dialogue.success_lie: Did you eat the thing?  Please tell me your joking.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Get a e-ink tablet PC for Tom Powell.

dialogue.offer: I've assembled quite a collection of evidence in my research, and I want an easier way to organize it.  If you could get me one of those e-ink tablets, I could scan all my documents into an easily-preserved digital format.  There's some money for you, too.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you, <name_g>.  The truth is ever closer!
dialogue.rejected: Don't you want to know the truth behind <the_cataclysm>?
dialogue.advice: I'd check an electronics store for one.
dialogue.success: Here's the money I promised you.  I'll start organizing my collection.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Find 25 missing person posters for Tom Powell.

dialogue.offer: I want to take a look at some of the missing posters for any links.  If you could get me twenty-five of them, I could start my analysis.  Make sure to get posters for adults, I don't think any children could provide links.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you, <name_g>.  The truth is ever closer!
dialogue.rejected: Don't you want to know the truth behind <the_cataclysm>?
dialogue.advice: There should be plenty on poster-boards around town.  A police station should have a lot.
dialogue.success: I wonder what the link could be.  Too much information?  Government conspiracy?  Aliens?  I'll have to find out.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Find 200 files for Tom Powell.

dialogue.offer: I've decided to broaden my horizons with my research, now I need more general documents for examination, get the big picture.  If you could get me two hundred files, on anything, I'll pay you for them.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you, <name_g>.  The truth is ever closer!
dialogue.rejected: Don't you want to know the truth behind <the_cataclysm>?
dialogue.advice: Office buildings, police stations, any high-profile place should have what we want.
dialogue.success: This should occupy my work for a while.  Thanks <name_g>, we'll discover the truth one of these days.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Find some MatheMAX for Olwen Powell.

dialogue.offer: I've started working on a small project of mine which requires a great deal of computational input.  A piece of MatheMAX software would be a great help.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.
dialogue.rejected: Doing this many calculations by hand isn't very fun, you know.
dialogue.advice: I'd check one of the local schools for a USB stick with it.
dialogue.success: This'll be quite useful in the future.  Thank you, <name_g>.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Get six antennae for Olwen Powell.

dialogue.offer: Corrie and I have been working on a way to get in touch with anyone who's still out there, and we've started rigging up an internet-to-radio broadcast.  The only thing we need are antennae, six of them specifically.
dialogue.accepted: This could give us a prosperous future, <name_g>.
dialogue.rejected: We've got to see how many people are out there.
dialogue.advice: A radio tower should have some lying around in storage.
dialogue.success: Now we can get in touch with a lot more people, see what's out there.  Thank you, <name_g>.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Find 300 cotton patches for Maria Serrano.

dialogue.offer: I'm starting to run low on cotton for my sewing.  I think three hundred cotton patches should hold me for a while; I'll pay you for them if you get me some.
dialogue.accepted: Great stuff!
dialogue.rejected: How am I supposed to tailor if I have nothing to tailor with?
dialogue.advice: You could try cutting up some unneeded sweaters from a clothing store, or you could make some yourself.
dialogue.success: Thank you, <name_g>.  This should do me for a while.
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Find an electric spinning wheel for Maria Serrano.

dialogue.offer: I want to try making my own cloth, it's getting harder to find the quantities I need.  I'll buy an electric spinning wheel if you can find one, it'd vastly expedite the process.
dialogue.accepted: Great stuff!
dialogue.rejected: I'd really help me in getting your stuff to you faster.
dialogue.advice: A textile museum should have one lying around.
dialogue.inquire: Have you found the spinning wheel?
dialogue.success: This is wonderful!  I'll really be able to put the pedal to the metal!
dialogue.failure: That's too bad…

description: Find 200 pipes for Helena Misinter.

dialogue.offer: We were in the process of refurbishing the retreat when <the_cataclysm> interrupted us.  Some of the plumbing around here was troublesome, and we need to fix that.  200 pipes should be all we need to finish it.
dialogue.accepted: May God protect you.
dialogue.rejected: I'll find someone else, then.
dialogue.advice: A public works or a craft shop should have some lying around.  If not, try a steel mill.
dialogue.success: Thank you.
dialogue.failure: As expected for such a person…

description: Find two planers for Helena Misinter.

dialogue.offer: I'm looking to construct some fortifications around the church, should any of Satan's devils decide to run amok.  We have most of the material needed for such an undertaking, but processing our raw lumber is taking far too long.  I've heard a planer could do such in a fraction of the time; I'll pay for two of them.
dialogue.accepted: May God protect you.
dialogue.rejected: I'll find someone else, then.
dialogue.advice: I'd poke around any industrial sites for some.
dialogue.success: Thank you.
dialogue.failure: As expected for such a person…

description: Kill some bandits for Helena Misinter.

dialogue.offer: Blasphemy, heresy, the righteous judgement of God!  I have found the scum of Hell pillaging a church for valuables!  Even in <the_cataclysm>, I shall not stand for this.  I want you to go there and wipe those <swear> <name_b>s from the Earth.
dialogue.accepted: Righteous judgement shall come!
dialogue.rejected: Are you standing with them?
dialogue.advice: Attack at night to surprise them.  Barring that, go in full force, guns blazing.  I wouldn't try to call a horde in, I don't want to ruin such a holy place.
dialogue.success: Thank you.
dialogue.failure: As expected for such a person…

description: Find five canning pots for Helena Misinter.

dialogue.offer: While we are blessed with a bountiful stock, we need a way to preserve our newer food, mainly those potatoes Darryl's growing.  Fortunately, he brought a book on canning things.  We need five canning pots to get the setup going in full fashion.
dialogue.accepted: May the Lord bless you.
dialogue.rejected: I'll find someone else, then.
dialogue.advice: An old factory might have one, or a hobby shop.
dialogue.inquire: Have you found the canning pots?
dialogue.success: Thank you.  You're welcome to some of our first batch, if you're interested.
dialogue.failure: As expected for such a person…

description: Go to the location Helena told you about and see who's there.

dialogue.offer: If you see this, it's a bug.
dialogue.accepted: If you see this, it's a bug.
dialogue.rejected: If you see this, it's a bug.
dialogue.advice: If you see this, it's a bug.
dialogue.success: This should be very useful to us.  Now we can truly begin our march of righteousness.
dialogue.success_lie: If you see this, it's a bug.
dialogue.failure: As expected for such a person…
